page.title: 14The Church Garden Party.
page.content: In our{village}there is a{church}and next to the{church}is our{vicarage} where the{vicar}lives.Every year in the summer there is a{Garden Party} where all the people are invited from the village.There are{games}run by children in the front{garden}of the vicarage.In the back {garden}there are tables and chairs where you can relax and have a wonderful time.There are { {raffles, tombolas,white elephants} and{cake stalls.}It is all very exciting.You can eat and drink but you have to pay for it.At the end,to get things cleared,every thing goes down in price.So instead of{drinks {of orange }being ten pence it is five pence and {ice cream}the same.Lots of people come a{hundred}or more.When it was about {5 o'clock}it was ending and people were going{home.
